name: rough-skin

effect.sun-moon: Inflicts only 1/16 of the attacker's maximum HP in damage.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts only 1/16 of the attacker's maximum HP in damage.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts only 1/16 of the attacker's maximum HP in damage.

short_effect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
